==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しも|つき|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
[[霜]] (しも, ''shimo''), "frost" + [[月]] (つき, ''tsuki''), "month"

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|しもつき|y=k|acc=2|dev=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しもつき}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=しもつき}} the eleventh month of the lunar calendar
# {{lb|ja|poetic|sort=しもつき}} the month of frost; [[November]]
